arts.ttl: Will Granit Xhaka leave Leverkusen in the summer?
arts.sum: Granit Xhaka is a permanent fixture at Bayer Leverkusen and still has a contract until 2028, but rumors are now circulating that the 32-year-old Swiss could leave the club in the summer.
